title: PM Shehbaz condoles death of ex-cricketer Nazeer Junior
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 21 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday expressed grief over the death of former Pakistani cricketer and umpire Muhammad Nazeer Junior.
The prime minister, in a statement, said that late Nazeer Junior brought fame to the country in the field of cricket through his fabulous performance.
He said that late Nazeer Juniorâ€™s achievements as cricketer and umpire was a pride for the entire nation.
The prime minister prayed to Allah Almighty for peace for the departed soul and strength for the bereaved family to bear the loss.
